summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6070 for the improvement of WEST THISTLE STREET from 35th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83251, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
